Question: Buildings associated with this person, including some of his many homes, have been preserved as museums.
Hints: This person's next major publication was The Adventures of Tom Sawyer, which drew on his youth in Hannibal.
In it, he also states that "this person" was the call made when the boat was in safe water – two fathoms (12 feet or 3.7 metres).
This person chose to pay all his pre-bankruptcy creditors in full, though he had no responsibility to do this under the law.
